title: Microsoft 365 admin center: New ways to find advanced deployment guides
description:
You’ll see a new look on the Advanced deployment guides page in the Microsoft 365 admin center and the setup.microsoft.com website. We’re updating the search tools, recommendations, and layout of both locations so it’s easier to find step-by-step guides for the product or scenario you’re deploying. You’ll also see new guides on setup.microsoft.com that are currently available only within the Microsoft 365 admin center.
GA date: December CY2022
